[1] South Ferry-bound trains run express from 72 St to Chambers St

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Jun 2 - 5

Trains stop at Times Sq-42 St, 34 St-Penn Station and 14 St.

For service to 66, 59 and 50 Sts, take the [1] to Times Sq-42 St and transfer to an
uptown [1], [2] local or [3]*.

For service to 28, 23 and 18 Sts, take the [1] to 14 St and transfer to an uptown [1], [2] local or [3].

For service to Christopher, Houston, Canal and Franklin Sts, take the [1] to Chambers St and
transfer to an uptown [1], [2] local or [3].

For service from these stations, take the [1] [2] or [3] to 14 St, 34 St-Penn Station or 72 St and
transfer to a South Ferry-bound [1].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

Service Change  Posted: 06/04/2017  2:06PM

B24Â and Q59 buses are detoured, due to a crane operation on Metropolitan Av between Meeker AvÂ and Union Av.

Detour is as follows:

B24 Greenpoint Bound: Via Rodney St into Meeker Av, right on Union Av, left on Metropolitan Av and regular route.

B24 Washington Plaza Bound: Via Rodney St, right on Union Av, left on Meeker Av, right on Metropolitan Av and regular route.

Q59 Washington Plaza Bound: Via Union Av, left on Meeker Av, right on Metropolitan Av and regular route.

Q59 Queens Blvd Bound: Via Metropolitan Av, left on Meeker Av, right on Union Av and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 06/04/2017  2:03PM

B52, B54 and Q58 buses are detoured, due to a crane operation on St Nicholas Av between Gates Av and Palmetto St.

Detour is as follows:

B52Â Towards Downtown Brooklyn: Via Palmetto St, left on Seneca Av, left on Gates Av and regular route.

B54Â Towards Ridgewood Terminal: Via Myrtle Av, left on Palmetto St, right on St Nicholas Av, right on Myrtle Av into the stand near side of Gates Av.

Q58 Towards Flushing: Via Palmetto St, right on St Nicholas Av, left on Myrtle Av, left on Madison St and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: Queens Midtown
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 06/04/2017 10:58AM

QMT: MANHATTAN EXIT PLAZA CLOSURE OF "DOWNTOWN" LANES FOR THREE MONTHS.

For approximately three months, the two right "Downtown" exit lanes at the Manhattan plaza of the Queens Midtown Tunnel will be closed for the final stage of exit plaza roadway rehabilitation. Customers traveling Downtown can use the four open and newly resurfaced "Uptown" or "Crosstown" exit lanes, or the left "Downtown" exit lane, which will remain open during this period. In addition, East 37th Street between Tunnel Exit and 2nd Avenue has been temporarily converted to receive two-way traffic, to accommodate motorists exiting the tunnel from the Uptown lanes and seeking a Downtown route via 2nd Avenue.



Planned Work
QMT WEEKEND SANDY REPAIR WORK FROM FRIDAY NIGHT 10 PM THROUGH MONDAY MORNING UNTIL 6 AM.

Service Change  Posted: 05/24/2017  4:35PM

QMT: MANHATTAN EXIT PLAZA CLOSURE OF "DOWNTOWN" LANES FOR THREE MONTHS.

For approximately three months, the two right "Downtown" exit lanes at the Manhattan plaza of the Queens Midtown Tunnel will be closed for the final stage of exit plaza roadway rehabilitation. Customers traveling Downtown can use the four open and newly resurfaced "Uptown" or "Crosstown" exit lanes, or the left "Downtown" exit lane, which will remain open during this period. In addition, East 37th Street between Tunnel Exit and 2nd Avenue has been temporarily converted to receive two-way traffic, to accommodate motorists exiting the tunnel from the Uptown lanes and seeking a Downtown route via 2nd Avenue.

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 06/02/2017 10:00PM

June 3-4:Â Buses Replace Trains between Ronkonkoma and Brentwood

Â

To accommodate track construction work related to the LIRR's Double Track Project, buses will replace trains between Ronkonkoma and Brentwood from 12:37 AM Saturday, June 3 until 12:21 AM Monday, June 5. Service will be affected as follows:

Â

Westbound

Customers at stations Ronkonkoma and Central Islip will board a bus to Brentwood, then transfer to a train for service to points west. Buses will depart up to 34 minutes earlier than usual train times.

  • The 10:05 AM, 11:05 AM & 12:05 PM westbound trains from Ronkonkoma will originate at Farmingdale. There will be no bus service from Ronkonkoma for these three trains. Customers at stations east of Farmingdale should board an earlier or later train (or board a bus at stations Ronkonkoma and Central Islip).

  • Greenport-Ronkonkoma trains will depart 21 minutes later than usual on Saturday and Sunday. At Ronkonkoma, customers will transfer to buses for service to Brentwood, where train service resumes.

  • Please plan for up to 60 minutes of additional travel time.

Eastbound

Eastbound Ronkonkoma Branch trains will terminate at Brentwood.

  • At Brentwood, customers will board buses for service to stations Central Islip and Ronkonkoma.

  • Medford-Greenport customers will also connect with buses at Brentwood.

  • The 4:39 PM, 5:39 PM and 6:39 PM trains from Penn Station will terminate at Farmingdale with no connecting bus service further east. Customers traveling east of Farmingdale should board a train 30 minutes earlier or 30 minutes later.

  • Please plan for up to 34 minutes of additional travel time.


For additional information, pick up a copy of the special Ronkonkoma Branch timetable dated Saturday & Sunday, June 3-4, 2017 or view the special timetable online at:

http://web.mta.info/lirr/Timetable/KO-2ndTrack_06-3-4-2017.pdf

Â

Please plan ahead: Similar service changes will also be in effect for several subsequent weekends as work progresses. More information will be made available as soon as possible.

Â

Â
